messages.subject: re libraries and funny html!
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to all who cleared up my confusion on the extra letters popping up in my email! (seriously I thought I might have to get the puter checked) As a lover
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to all who cleared up my confusion on the extra letters popping up in
my email! (seriously I thought I might have to get the puter checked) As a
lover of books, book stores and libraries, I am so jealous of those of you
that have a choice of libraries in your towns! We just have the one
city/county library and some outreach half buses, half RVs that carry books
too local small towns and communities called Bookmobiles. I went over to
Hobby Lobby and picked up some fairly large canvas bags (unbleached about
20"x30" i guess) and brought them home, painted them all up with fabric
paints. I put my kids library cards in them and their books. We take them to
the library with us, and the books are supposedly to go back in the bags as
soon as the child is done reading. This works as long as i am the one to find
and pick up the books! For me, I carry a nice sized hemp basket but am
looking for something a bit more oblong... (another excuse for me to visit
Hobby Lobby! Oh and while I am here I think I will just pick up some more
scrapbooking supplies, and look at these brushes, I do so need some new paint
brushes, OHOHOH!!! and lookie! fabric is on sale!....) ~Nancy who has lost
her mind at the thought of going to the local craft store! :o)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
